Articles.Content:
Hyperedit + custom texture + custom heightmaps = crowd-sourced solar systems.

Don't forget Kerbtown for custom buildings, launch facilities, Easter eggs, etc.

Don't forget Kerbtown for custom buildings, launch facilities, Easter eggs, etc.

Hey white owl! Could you do a mod review for this mod?

I haven't recorded anything in a coupla weeks because some rather annoying medical stuff makes me feel like crap... but when I do start recording again I'll definitely be using this mod. It's a must have.

I haven't recorded anything in a coupla weeks because some rather annoying medical stuff makes me feel like crap... but when I do start recording again I'll definitely be using this mod. It's a must have.

Cheers, hople you'll feel better, and I have one request from you in this video, if you can show one of my mods (which are the Sol System or the better Moho), because as I see recently everyone is doing spacex34 mod and readen's skybox only...

Experimenting with textures further I made some crappy and simple Mass-Effect-esque color scheme for the EVA suits.

Here's a download if you kinda like them I suppose O_o Black EVA suit

Experimenting with textures further I made some crappy and simple Mass-Effect-esque color scheme for the EVA suits.

Here's a download if you kinda like them I suppose O_o Black EVA suit

Oh god yes, godamit I need a tamplate! Is it illigle to send it in PM? and another question, can you paint on there helmet's glass?
Those custom suits are freaking awesome. I want to make my own now.

Those custom suits are freaking awesome. I want to make my own now.

Same, but I don't know how to extract the template from the game, is it legal to post the download of the template?

Oh god yes, godamit I need a tamplate! Is it illigle to send it in PM? and another question, can you paint on there helmet's glass?

I don't know how to paint the helmet's glass, but the download link was at the bottom of my last post. Click it

Cheers, hople you'll feel better, and I have one request from you in this video, if you can show one of my mods (which are the Sol System or the better Moho), because as I see recently everyone is doing spacex34 mod and readen's skybox only...

By the way for your Sol system, I think that to boost the number of downloads, you should stick to modding planets that have no oceans. Turning Duna into Mars is very relevant for instance, but even if Kerbin is quite similar to Earth in its characteristics, the terrestrial masses do not match (obviously), which will of course induce gameplay issues if you apply Earth textures to it, therefore it should be provided as a different mod just like the meme-system. I think that keeping planets with oceans as they are (or with improved textures and clouds when relevant), but turning other planets into their Solar System's counterparts (keeping in mind that it's better when custom textures color schemes match those of the ground) would be the best way to make the mod more popular, because it would be playable. Your Duna and Jool are quite nice for instance! Eeloo turned into Pluto or Charon (or perhaps Triton, but there are other candidates) would be another example that I would be interested in!

That's just a suggestion, and most of all, just my opinion. Perhaps people will not think that way of course!

Edited August 10, 2013 by Korb Biakustra

I don't know how to paint the helmet's glass, but the download link was at the bottom of my last post. Click it

Well, you can't, atleast your textures looks freaking awesome!

By the way for your Sol system, I think that to boost the number of downloads, you should stick to modding planets that have no oceans. Turning Duna into Mars is very relevant for instance, but even if Kerbin is quite similar to Earth in its characteristics, the terrestrial masses do not match (obviously), which will of course induce gameplay issues if you apply Earth textures to it, therefore it should be provided as a different mod just like the meme-system. I think that keeping planets with oceans as they are (or with improved textures and clouds when relevant), but turning other planets into their Solar System's counterparts (keeping in mind that it's better when custom textures color schemes match those of the ground) would be the best way to make the mod more popular, because it would be playable. Your Duna and Jool are quite nice for instance! Eeloo turned into Uranus or Nepture would be another example that I would be interested in!

That's just a suggestion, and most of all, just my opinion. Perhaps people will not think that way of course!

Will do.

How about a Hi-Res EVA suit? Just a re-tex of the standard one, but hi-res. Is an 8k EVA suit possible?

How about a Hi-Res EVA suit? Just a re-tex of the standard one, but hi-res. Is an 8k EVA suit possible?

I don't know but I think it's kinda pointless, because you can't really see the eva suit because the Kerbal's body is so small.

But it might just be a good idea.

I don't know but I think it's kinda pointless, because you can't really see the eva suit because the Kerbal's body is so small.

Still, I'd love to see one. I hate how blurry the suit it as it stands.

Still, I'd love to see one. I hate how blurry the suit it as it stands.

Same, meanwhile I use the "Black EVA" mod, you should try it.

By the way, this mod should be renamed to "Universal Replacer" becuase now you can change Kerbals as well!
the suits are actually really high res, if you zoom in really close you will notice.

Love the 8k Kerbin. I just grabbed it and it is nice and smooth on the box, and well, who can complain about results like this!?
The Black EVA Suit looks pretty cool - but I'd still love to use the Crash Test Dummy skin even more, it's so perfect for this game.

Is it possible if anyone could take sections of Google Earth cities and place them on Kerbin? I'm not the expert on these kind of things, but it seems possible to place real (textured) cities onto Kerbin.
This is probably one of the best mods ever. This adds a ton of customization to the game!

So any wishes on what you guys want next? More stock parts? GUI? Surface textures? Something else?

I haven't really seen anyone start a 'project' so I'm not exactly sure what would be a waste of time or not.

what is the name of the texture's grass around the launch site ?
